text: The Best (TC: 壹精選) is the first greatest hits album by Hong Kong singer Edmond Leung. ==Track listing== #No.1 (第一位) #Love Once and Forever (一世一次戀愛) #Miss You All (想念你的一切) #Thinging of You (想着你等着你 - 94 unplugged) #100% In Love with You (一百巴仙愛上你 - 第101次Remix) #Tie Me Up, Tie Me Down (綑着我困着我 - 縛縛Remix) #Summer No No No (夏季不不不) #Don't Want to Be Alone (不願一個人) #Hesitantly (欲言又止) #One Night In A Certain Month (某月某夜) #Lingering Games (纏綿遊戲) #Rainy Nignt (流離夜雨...雨中花) #No.1 (Remix) ==Charts== {|class="wikitable" |- !Chart (1994) !Peak position |- | IFPI Hong Kong Group | style="text-align:center;"|2 |} ==References== Category:Edmond Leung albums Category:1994 albums
title: The Best (Edmond Leung album)
